name: More than a Clown
description:
Victor is a clown who was born and raised in the circus.

After 50 years in the spotlight, he’s decided to make a break
for it and go out into the real world! He will try to achieve his
lifelong dream of becoming a successful businessman.
He’s ready to embrace the 9-5 grind, put on a suit and tie, and
conquer the corporate world.

Will Victor be able to overcome the obstacles and make a name
for himself in the business world? Play the game and find out!

Credits:

Designed and animated by: Lila Egozy, Noam Semo

Developed by: Yair Klausner, Amir Boxer, Natan Goldstein
